reference.shortdesc: Bold text is text that is used to draw a reader's attention to a phrase without otherwise adding meaning to the content.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the b element is typically rendered in a bold font.
The bold component is typically rendered in a bold font.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The b element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.
